title: Training Quest
summary: Speak to Riona in Mileth Inn to start your training

title: Choosing a Class
summary: Go to the path temple after completing the training quest and choose your class.

title: Devlin's Ingredients
summary: Speak to Devlin the white magic master in Mileth

title: A Journey to Suomi
summary: Speak to Oona in Mileth's restaurant. She's in need of some help.

title: The Beggar's Terror
summary:
Speak with the beggar in Mileth's tavern. 
Level requirement: 11-41
